title: Collectors
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Luigi Acquisto, Chris McGill and Diana Leach
brief_description: An inventive and funny documentary that looks at various types of collections: snow domes, frogs, spark plugs, etc. Even more interesting are the collectors themselves who are forever in search of that ‘gem’.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Luigi Acquisto, Chris McGill and Diana Leach
